channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ChatGPT Hits 1 Billion Users? ‘Doubled In Just Weeks’ Says OpenAI CEO
item.description: Sam Altman might have inadvertently leaked that ChatGPT is at 1 billion users when private remarks were shared at TED 2025. Here's what was said.

item.title: Verified Digital Identities: The Key To Online Safety
item.description: In the face of increasingly complex and deceptive online scams, what measures can individuals adopt to protect themselves? Answer by Catherine Porter.

item.title: Passion or Pragmatism - Advice For Aspiring Scientists Right Now
item.description: As the research and federal landscapes shift, some students are questioning the viability of scientific careers. Here's some advice.
